Targeted therapy involves the use of drugs that specifically target cancer cells, based on their unique molecular characteristics. Dr. Varella would be able to identify patients who are likely to benefit from targeted therapy and administer these drugs appropriately.

Immunotherapy involves the use of drugs that stimulate the patient's own immune system to fight cancer. Dr. Varella would be knowledgeable about the different types of immunotherapy available and be able to select the most appropriate immunotherapy regimen for each patient.

Hormone therapy is used to treat cancers that are sensitive to hormones, such as breast cancer and prostate cancer. Dr. Varella would be able to prescribe hormone therapy and monitor patients for side effects.
